references.paper_title: Paligemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper introduces Paligemma, a versatile 3B VLM used as the backbone model in VisualLens, significantly impacting its performance and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP ViT-L/14@336px, from this paper, is used for image encoding in VisualLens, a crucial step in processing visual information for personalized recommendations.

references.paper_title: Uncovering chatGPT's capabilities in recommender systems
references.reason: This paper explores the capabilities of ChatGPT in recommender systems, providing a relevant comparison point for the VisualLens approach which leverages multimodal LLMs.

references.paper_title: Towards unified multi-modal personalization: Large vision-language models for generative recommendation and beyond
references.reason: This paper, focusing on unified multi-modal personalization using large vision-language models, provides a relevant comparison and context for the VisualLens method.

references.paper_title: Minicpm-v: A gpt-4v level mllm on your phone
references.reason: MiniCPM-V2.5, from this paper, serves as an alternative backbone model for VisualLens, demonstrating the approach's adaptability and robustness across different model architectures.
